code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{motion,AnimatePresence}from'framer-motion';import{GameContainer,GameCard,Input,Button}from'../styles/GameStyles';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Game=()=>{const[targetNumber]=useState(()=>Math.floor(Math.random()*100)+1);const[guess,setGuess]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[attempts,setAttempts]=useState(0);const[gameWon,setGameWon]=useState(false);const handleGuess=()=>{const numberGuess=parseInt(guess);setAttempts(prev=>prev+1);if(numberGuess===targetNumber){setMessage('ðŸŽ‰ Congratulations! You got it!');setGameWon(true);}else if(numberGuess<targetNumber){setMessage('ðŸ“ˆ Go higher!');}else{setMessage('ðŸ“‰ Go lower!');}setGuess('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(GameContainer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.h1,{initial:{y:-50,opacity:0},animate:{y:0,opacity:1},transition:{duration:0.5},children:"Number Guessing Game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(GameCard,{initial:{scale:0.9,opacity:0},animate:{scale:1,opacity:1},transition:{duration:0.5},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Guess a number between 1 and 100"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Attempts: ",attempts]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{type:"number",value:guess,onChange:e=>setGuess(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter your guess",disabled:gameWon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AnimatePresence,{children:message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.p,{initial:{opacity:0,y:10},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},exit:{opacity:0},style:{marginBottom:'1rem',textAlign:'center'},children:message})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleGuess,disabled:gameWon||!guess,children:"Make Guess"}),gameWon&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>window.location.reload(),style:{marginTop:'1rem',background:'linear-gradient(45deg, #00c853 0%, #64dd17 100%)'},children:"Play Again"})]})]});};export default Game;
